titles: The conspiracie, and tragedie of Charles Duke of Byron, Marshall of France Acted lately in two playes, at the Black-Friers. Writted by George Chapman.
author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
publisher: Printed by G. Eld for Thomas Thorppe, and are to be sold [by Laurence Lisle] at the Tygers head in Paules Church-yard,
notes: The first word of the title is xylographic.
"The tragedie of Charles Duke of Byron" has separate divisional title; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Biron, Charles de Gontaut, --  duc de, 1562-1602 --  Drama.
